template.subject: {{{ lang 'subject' store=store.name }}}
template.body:
{{#if store.logo.url}} {{else}} {{store.logo.title}} {{/if}}
 

{{lang 'title'}}

{{lang 'hello' name=customer.first_name}}
{{lang 'message'}}

 
{{#each cart.products}} {{#if thumbnail}} {{/if}} {{/each}}

{{name}}

{{#if sku}}

{{sku}}

{{/if}}

{{lang 'quantity'}} {{quantity}}

 
{{#if coupon.code}}

{{lang 'coupon_code_message' amount=coupon.amount.formatted}}
{{coupon.code}}

 
{{/if}}

{{lang 'complete_order_message'}}

 

{{lang 'complete_order'}}

 
 

{{{store.name}}}

{{store.domain_name}}

{{lang 'go_shopping'}}
 

{{{lang 'unsubscribe' link=notification.unsubscribe_link}}}

 
{{#for 1 30}}   {{/for}}

keys.subject: Complete your purchase at {store}...
keys.title: Complete your purchase
keys.message: You recently visited our online store and we noticed that you didn't complete your order for the following items:
keys.coupon_code_message: Enter coupon code below during checkout to receive {amount} off each item!
keys.complete_order_message: To complete your order right now, just click on the link below:
keys.unsubscribe: Unsubscribe from future emails like this
